annotation_sentence: Um, yes, of course. We have many festivals, but one very important is Eid.
rationale: The word 'many' is a quantifier indicating a large number of festivals. The word 'one' is a numeral indicating a single festival.

annotation_sentence: We wear new clothes, and we eat... uh, many special foods.
rationale: The word 'many' is a quantifier indicating a large number of special foods.

annotation_sentence: Yes, one time we... um, all cousins meet at grandparents' house.
rationale: The word 'one' is a numeral referring to a single instance. The word 'all' is a quantifier indicating the totality of cousins.

annotation_sentence: Very important. It is time for... um, forgiveness and, uh, community.
rationale: The word 'Very' acts as a quantifier intensifying the importance of the statement.
